column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Had to try deep dish pizza while in Chicago. We were seated immediately outside
column2: super nice evening. Our server was great! Friendly
column4: made it an enjoyable experience. Tried chicken wings
column7: yum! Also shared a small deep dish pepperoni. Very good. So filling
column8: we only had a slice each. Glad we tried this place.
